trans-unit.source: Contains a collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> objects.
A <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> has a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> that contains <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> objects collected from a stylus and digitizer.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>具有<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>包含<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>从触笔与数字化器收集的对象。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> to customize the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>以自定义<xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>。

trans-unit.source: The following example overrides the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.DrawCore%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to draw a circle at each <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> comprising a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例重写<xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.DrawCore%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，以便绘制在每个圆圈<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>构成<xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.FitToCurve%2A> property is set to `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.GetBezierStylusPoints%2A> method returns the stylus points.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.FitToCurve%2A>属性设置为`true`、<xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.GetBezierStylusPoints%2A>方法返回触笔接触点。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.StylusPoints%2A> property returns the stylus points.
trans-unit.target: 否则为<xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.StylusPoints%2A>属性返回触笔接触点。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection" /> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection" /> class.
The following example collects <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> objects in the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.OnStylusDown%2A> method of a custom control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例收集<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>中的对象<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.OnStylusDown%2A>自定义控件的方法。

trans-unit.source: The example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> by specifying the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription> and the initial size of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 该示例创建<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>通过指定<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription>和的初始大小<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>。

trans-unit.source: A generic IEnumerable of type <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> to add to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection" />.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection" /> class with the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> objects.
The following example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="stylusPoints" /> is <see langword="null" />.
The length of <paramref name="points" /> is 0.
-or-
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> objects in <paramref name="stylusPoints" /> have incompatible <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription" /> objects.

A generic IEnumerable of type <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" /> that specifies the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> objects to add to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection" />.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection" /> class with specified points.
The following example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="points" /> is <see langword="null" />.
The length of <paramref name="points" /> is 0.
The number of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> objects the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection" /> can initially contain.

Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection" /> class that may initially contain the specified number of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> objects.
When you use the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.%23ctor%2A> constructor to create a new <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>, you specify it's `initialCapacity`.
trans-unit.target: 当你使用<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.%23ctor%2A>构造函数来创建一个新<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>，可指定它的`initialCapacity`。

trans-unit.source: However, you can add more <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> objects by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Add%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 但是，你可以添加更多<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>对象通过调用<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Add%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following example collects <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> objects in the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.OnStylusDown%2A> method of a custom control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例收集<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>中的对象<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.OnStylusDown%2A>自定义控件的方法。

trans-unit.source: The example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> by specifying both the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription> and the initial size of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 该示例创建<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>指定这两个<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription>和的初始大小<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="initialCapacity" /> is negative.
A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription" /> that specifies the additional properties stored in each <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" />.

Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection" /> class that contains the properties specified in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription" />.

All <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> objects added to the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> must have a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription> that is compatible with `stylusPointDescription`.
trans-unit.target: 所有<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>对象添加到<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>必须具有<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription>与兼容`stylusPointDescription`。

trans-unit.source: The following example collects <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> objects in the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.OnStylusDown%2A> method of a custom control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例收集<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>中的对象<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.OnStylusDown%2A>自定义控件的方法。

trans-unit.source: The example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> by specifying the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription> and the initial size of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 该示例创建<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>通过指定<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription>和的初始大小<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="stylusPointDescription" /> is <see langword="null" />.
A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription" /> that specifies the additional properties stored in each <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" />.
The number of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> objects the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection" /> can initially contain.

Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection" /> class that is the specified size and contains the properties specified in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription" />.

When you use the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.%23ctor%2A> constructor to create a new <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>, the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> is created with the capacity to hold the specified number of <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> objects.
trans-unit.target: 当你使用<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.%23ctor%2A>构造函数来创建一个新<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>、<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>创建具有容量以容纳的指定的数<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>对象。

trans-unit.source: You can add more <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> objects than `initialCapacity` by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Add%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 你可以添加更多<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>对象比`initialCapacity`通过调用<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Add%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following example collects <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> objects in the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.OnStylusDown%2A> method of a custom control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例收集<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>中的对象<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.OnStylusDown%2A>自定义控件的方法。

trans-unit.source: The example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> by specifying the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription> and the initial size of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 该示例创建<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>通过指定<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription>和的初始大小<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="initialCapacity" /> is negative.
<paramref name="stylusPointDescription" /> is <see langword="null" />.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection" /> to add to the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection" />.
Adds the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection" /> to the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection" />.
The following example collects <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> objects in the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.OnStylusDown%2A> method of a custom control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例收集<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>中的对象<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.OnStylusDown%2A>自定义控件的方法。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="stylusPoints" /> is <see langword="null" />.

The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription" /> of <paramref name="stylusPoints" /> is not compatible with the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Description" /> property.
Occurs when the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection" /> changes.
The following example demonstrates how to handle the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Changed> event.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何处理<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Changed>事件。

trans-unit.source: Removes all <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> objects from the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection" />.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection" /> is connected to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke" />.
Copies the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection" />.

A new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection" /> that contains copies of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> objects in the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection" />.
The following example demonstrates how to copy a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何将复制<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>。

trans-unit.source: The example creates a stroke comprised of members of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> and adds them to an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>.
trans-unit.target: 该示例创建的成员组成的笔画<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>并将它们添加到<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>。

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that there is an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> called `inkcanvs1`.
trans-unit.target: 此示例假定有<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>调用`inkcanvs1`。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription" /> that is associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> objects in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection" />.

The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription" /> that is associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> objects in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription" />关联<see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" />中的对象<see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection" />。

trans-unit.source: The following example gets the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription> for a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> and gets the information for each <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo> in the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例获取<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription>为<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>和获取每个信息<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo>中<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription>。

trans-unit.source: The position at which to insert the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" />.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> to insert into the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection" />.
Inserts the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> into the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection" /> at the specified position.

The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription" /> of <paramref name="stylusPoint" /> is not compatible with the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Description" /> property.
<paramref name="index" /> is greater or equal to the number of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> objects in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection" />.
An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Changed" /> event.
The stylus point collection to convert to a point array.
Converts a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection" /> into a point array.
A point array that contains points that correspond to each <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection" />.
The following example demonstrates how to erase the strokes that are surrounded by a lasso.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何擦除包围套索。

trans-unit.source: The example assumes that there is an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkPresenter> called `presenter`.
trans-unit.target: 该示例假定没有<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkPresenter>调用`presenter`。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription" /> to intersect with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription" /> of the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection" />.
Finds the intersection of the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Description" /> property.

A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection" /> that has a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription" /> that is a subset of the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription" /> and the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription" /> that the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection" /> uses.

`subsetToReformatTo` is a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription> which describes a subset of values belonging to the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Description%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: `subsetToReformatTo` 是<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription>哪一种适合的值属于子集<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Description%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription.GetCommonDescription%2A> method to get a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription> that intersects the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Description%2A> of the current <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription.GetCommonDescription%2A>方法以获取<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription>相交<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Description%2A>的当前<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Reformat%2A> method returns a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> that contains the same <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> objects as those belonging to the current <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Reformat%2A>方法返回<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>包含相同<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>对象，以作为属于当前<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> objects in the new <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> uses `subsetToReformatTo` as the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>中新的对象<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>使用`subsetToReformatTo`作为<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Reformat%2A> uses the constraints from the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo> of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Description%2A> property, even if the constraints in `subsetToReformatTo` are different.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Reformat%2A> 使用从约束<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo>的<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Description%2A>属性，即使在约束`subsetToReformatTo`不同。

trans-unit.source: For example, if `subsetToReformatTo` uses the values 0 and 1023 for <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.NormalPressure> whereas <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Description%2A> uses the values 0 and 255.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果`subsetToReformatTo`使用值 0 到 1023年<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.NormalPressure>而<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Description%2A>使用值 0 和 255。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Reformat%2A> returns a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription> using the values, 0 and 255.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Reformat%2A> 返回<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription>使用值 0 和 255 之间。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to create a new <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> that uses a different <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何创建一个新<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>使用其他<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="subsetToReformatTo" /> is not a subset of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Description" /> property.
The position at which to remove the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" />.
Removes the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> at the specified position from the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection" />.

The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection" /> is connected to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke" /> and there is only one <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection" />.
The position at which to set the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" />.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> to set at the specified position.
Sets the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> at the specified position.

The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription" /> of <paramref name="stylusPoint" /> is not compatible with the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Description" /> property.
<paramref name="index" /> is greater than the number of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> objects in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection" />.
Converts the property values of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> objects into a 32-bit signed integer array.
